summary: The diff indicates an attempt to improve the "Back to dashboard" button styling in `YearlySummaryTable.tsx`, with supporting documentation claiming it is now a high-contrast solid button visible in light/dark mode. However, the actual button styling change is not visible in the provided truncated code snippet. Additionally, the diff includes unrelated metadata/documentation changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Claim that the dashboard summary view "now renders without the black header bar" (a UI/layout change beyond the requested button styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (non-goal: no redesign beyond button styling) and appears only as a statement in the file summary rather than a requirement-driven change.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking entries (AR-1/AR-2) marked as pending in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest requirements (requested only a frontend button style change); this is extra metadata/work-tracking behavior not requested.
